evaluation_template.prompt: Evaluate the contribution metric of the following message: {content} from a node in the world of current world state: {state}, and there is the commit message of this node:{history} (Determine whether it can change the state of the world and whether this is consistent with its historical submission).Place your think process in xml tag <think>. Suggest the metric in the xml tag <metric>. The metric should be a number from 0.0-1.0.
